main_definition: Romance can refer to a feeling of love or attraction towards someone, as well as the plot or theme involving this emotion in literature and movies.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A relationship based on love or sexual attraction between two people
meanings_and_examples.example: John and Sarah started a romantic relationship after meeting at college.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The plot or theme of an artistic work involving love or passionate emotions
meanings_and_examples.example: William Shakespeare's play 'Romeo and Juliet' is considered one of the greatest examples of a romance in literature.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A setting or atmosphere associated with romantic feelings, often involving candlelight dinners, flowers, and intimate moments
meanings_and_examples.example: The couple decided to have an outdoor picnic under the stars as their romantic date night.
